commandDescription: Splits permissionsets into various csv files
dirFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input permissionsets. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a permissionset file in input. Example: MyPermissionSet.permissionset-meta.xml
outputFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output permissionsets. Default: '%s'
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
